    D

    decide() - Method in interface domain.Item
    depends of the item will decide the movement and state
    decide() - Method in class domain.Person
    Act
    decide() - Method in class domain.Road
    if there are no objects on the right, new roads will be created to block the grid.
    decide() - Method in class domain.Schelling
    They only move if they are dissatisfied with their neighbors, if the are fine where they are they do not move, their state changes to indifferent if the neighbors, they are dissatisfied if less than 1/3 of the neighbors are not like them, they are satisfied if more than 1/3 of the neighbors are like them and not all are like them.
    decide() - Method in class domain.Slider
    Begins to move horizontally without leaving the grid, if it has neighbors it change its state to happy and moves opposite in the grid if cant make a move change stay in the same position.
    decide() - Method in class domain.TrafficLight
    Starting from a global variable initialized at 1, it will increase and if it is greater than 4, the counter is reset to 1.
    decide() - Method in class domain.Walker
    Begins to move north without leaving the grid, if it has neighbors it change its state to happy if cant make a move change state to dissatisfied.
    DISSATISFIED - Static variable in class domain.Agent
